benchmark_details.name: T2VHaluBench
benchmark_details.overview: A benchmark dataset designed specifically for assessing the performance of hallucination detection methods in large text-to-video models.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate advancements in T2V hallucination detection technologies.
purpose_and_intended_users.limitations: Does not cover all possible hallucination types.

data.source: Generated videos by Runway-Gen-2 and Sora
data.annotation: Annotated for consistency, static, and dynamic hallucinations.

methodology.calculation: Score calculated based on computed severity of hallucinations.
methodology.validation: Experimental measurements conducted on T2V model outputs.

targeted_risks.harm: Potential misinformation from hallucinated video content.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: Generated content is not associated with real individuals.
ethical_and_legal_considerations.data_licensing: Videos generated by public models (Runway-Gen-2 and Sora).
ethical_and_legal_considerations.compliance_with_regulations: Follows ethical guidelines for AI-generated content.
